sentences.english: In the darkness they stumbled and squelched, lost their way and nearly drowned.
sentences.chinese: 黑暗中磕磕绊绊还迷了路，还差点淹死。

sentences.english: There will be bumps on the road to recovery.
sentences.chinese: 在复苏的道路上总会有些磕磕绊绊的。

one step, one footprint (idiom); steady progress/reliable
